desc:
An applet is a small program that is intended not to be run on
its own, but rather to be embedded inside another application.
The Applet class must be the superclass of any
applet that is to be embedded in a Web page or viewed by the Java
Applet Viewer. The Applet class provides a standard
interface between applets and their environment.

entries.desc:
This class implements accessibility support for the
Applet class.
entries.name: Applet.AccessibleApplet

entries.desc:
Called by the browser or applet viewer to inform
this applet that it is being reclaimed and that it should destroy
any resources that it has allocated.
entries.name: destroy()

entries.desc: Gets the AccessibleContext associated with this Applet.
entries.name: getAccessibleContext()

entries.desc:
Determines this applet's context, which allows the applet to
query and affect the environment in which it runs.
entries.name: getAppletContext()

entries.desc: Returns information about this applet.
entries.name: getAppletInfo()

entries.desc:
Returns the AudioClip object specified by the
URL argument.
entries.name: getAudioClip(URL url)

entries.desc:
Returns the AudioClip object specified by the
URL and name arguments.
entries.name:
getAudioClip(URL url,
String name)

entries.desc: Gets the base URL.
entries.name: getCodeBase()

entries.desc: Gets the URL of the document in which this applet is embedded.
entries.name: getDocumentBase()

entries.desc:
Returns an Image object that can then be painted on
the screen.
entries.name: getImage(URL url)

entries.desc:
Returns an Image object that can then be painted on
the screen.
entries.name:
getImage(URL url,
String name)

entries.desc: Gets the locale of the applet.
entries.name: getLocale()

entries.desc: Returns the value of the named parameter in the HTML tag.
entries.name: getParameter(String name)

entries.desc:
Returns information about the parameters that are understood by
this applet.
entries.name: getParameterInfo()

entries.desc:
Called by the browser or applet viewer to inform
this applet that it has been loaded into the system.
entries.name: init()

entries.desc: Determines if this applet is active.
entries.name: isActive()

entries.desc: Indicates if this container is a validate root.
entries.name: isValidateRoot()

entries.desc: Get an audio clip from the given URL.
entries.name: newAudioClip(URL url)

entries.desc: Plays the audio clip at the specified absolute URL.
entries.name: play(URL url)

entries.desc:
Plays the audio clip given the URL and a specifier that is
relative to it.
entries.name:
play(URL url,
String name)

entries.desc: Requests that this applet be resized.
entries.name: resize(Dimension d)

entries.desc: Requests that this applet be resized.
entries.name:
resize(int width,
int height)

entries.desc: Sets this applet's stub.
entries.name: setStub(AppletStub stub)

entries.desc:
Requests that the argument string be displayed in the
"status window".
entries.name: showStatus(String msg)

entries.desc:
Called by the browser or applet viewer to inform
this applet that it should start its execution.
entries.name: start()

entries.desc:
Called by the browser or applet viewer to inform
this applet that it should stop its execution.
entries.name: stop()
